text: Ni shuo:“Xinfeng tian jing de ren a! Nimen lai ba, rang women gongtong zunshou yi zhong shuangfang renwei gongping de xintiao: Women dajia zhi chongbai an la, bu yi renhe wu pei ta, chu an la wai, bu yi tonglei wei zhuzai.” Ruguo tamen beiqi zhe zhong xintiao, name, nimen shuo:“Qing nimen zuozheng women shi guishun de ren
